name: Thunder Bonchi
description:
*NOTICE* This game is still in development.
This demo ends after the boss with special titles.

If you like this game and want to follow and support the development please consider donating to the project, which help motivate completing this game.

If you are a game artist\designer\developer and would like to help with the developments please contact me at the discord server.

Or just for any feed back or discussion.

https://discord.gg/4nZwBN

Take a moment to go over the controls and rules

The game saves every door and exit you enter,

You can pause the game and use the store
There you can spend rings to get new weapons
0 rings means you are vulnerable
if you collect a 100 you'll get new life but counter will zero out

PS4\Xbox Controller

L analog - Move
R analog - Directional Shoot (only left and right when you have one life)
'R2' - Shield
'L2' - Dash
'O\B' - advance text
'option\start' - Pause \ Store< 'X\A' - Buy in pause \ equip weapon in game (when available)
'R1'/'L1' - Cycle Store\weapons

Keyboard

Arrows move

'A' - Shoot Left - 
'D' - Shoot Right
'W' - Shoot up (with a satellite)
'S'- Shoot down  (with a satellite)
'Left Shift' - Shield
'SpaceBar' - Dash
'T' - advance text
'P' - Pause \ Store
'F' - Buy in pause \ equip weapon in game (when available)
'Q'/'E' - Cycle Store\weapons

no mac version sorry
